comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Somehow I think that Steve's absence will bring a bit more sanity to our ride choices. With the mercury set to eclipse 94F again today I think I will pass up the opportunity to ride. Besides, I have lunch plans with a lady-friend of mine. Do you remember last time we rode in three-digit-temperatures on Dave's 600th ride up Flagstaff?

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: You are correct, sir. I'll be at the project update meeting at noon. There are a few projects for which I'll provide updates, so I kinda need to be there. If anyone else is interested in attending, the seminar room is _very_ well air conditioned and I think there will be cookies, brownies or treats of some kind.
